E-Mail Messages
Date: Wednesday, 5/28/1988
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Juan Bernhardt



Date: Monday, 6/2/1988
Subject: Contract
Dear Sir,
I would like to negotiate a contract extension!
Please let me know if you are interested!

Regards,
Mike Davis



Date: Monday, 6/2/1988
Subject: Progress of Gil Heredia
Dear Sir,
Gil Heredia is doing pretty good at A Hagerstown Suns!
He has an ERA of 3.06, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Regards,
Team Doctor

Dewey Robinson
